{"id":1441283584,"question_id":3636,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1730601128,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1441283584/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check Balanced String","memory":"8.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool isBalanced(string num) {\n        int even = 0, odd = 0;\n        for (int i=0; i<(int)num.size(); i++) {\n            if (i % 2) {\n                odd += num[i] - '0';\n            } else {\n                even += num[i] - '0';\n            }\n        }\n        return even == odd; \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-balanced-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
